comment: The standard definition of a norm turns any pre-Hilbert space over a subfield of ` CCfld ` closed under square roots of nonnegative reals into a subcomplex pre-Hilbert space (which allows access to a norm, metric, and topology). (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 11-Oct-2015.)
